title: HK model Abby Choi case:  the tip of the iceberg of the power struggle at the top brass of the CCP
description:
#chinainsights 
 It can be inferred that the Choi family, her ex-husband's family, and her current husband's family are intertwined with the Hong Kong triads, the police, the corporate world, and the cultural and entertainment circles. It isn't hard to understand the speculation of some media that Abby Choi could have been a pawn from the beginning. When she was needed, she was on the stage, and the three families were likely to have worked together. When a top power group no longer needed her or even considered her presence to be a threat, she met with bad luck.
